price: 98. Il devancera son peuple au Jour de la Résurrection et les conduira au Feu. Horrible aiguade que l’aiguade du Feu !
arabic: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yaqdumu qawmahu yawma al-qiyāmati fa-awradahumu al-nāra wabi'sa al-wir'du al-mawrūdu
